00048 #pragma mark - Class Methods
00049 
00050 + (void) load {
00051         @autoreleasepool {
00052                 NSFileManager *fm = [NSFileManager new];
00053                 if (NO == [fm fileExistsAtPath:[self cachesDir]]) {
00054                         NSError *error = nil;
00055                         if (NO == [fm createDirectoryAtPath:[self cachesDir] withIntermediateDirectories:YES attributes:nil error:&error]) {
00056                                 RCLog(@"Could not create RESTClient caches %@ (%@)", [error localizedDescription], [error userInfo]);
00057                         }
00058                 }
00059         }
00060 }
00061 
00062 + (void) log:(NSString *)format, ... {
00063         static id RESTClientLoggingOnEnvironment = nil;
00064         static BOOL isLoggingEnabled = NO;
00065         @synchronized(@"RESTClientLoggingOn") {
00066                 if (nil == RESTClientLoggingOnEnvironment) {
00067                         NSProcessInfo *processInfo = [NSProcessInfo processInfo];
00068                         RESTClientLoggingOnEnvironment = [[processInfo environment] objectForKey:@"RESTClientLoggingOn"];
00069                         if (nil == RESTClientLoggingOnEnvironment) {
00070                                 RESTClientLoggingOnEnvironment = [NSNumber numberWithBool:NO]; // don't check anymore
00071                                 isLoggingEnabled = NO;
00072                         } else {
00073                                 isLoggingEnabled = [RESTClientLoggingOnEnvironment boolValue];
00074                         }
00075                 }
00076         }
00077         if (isLoggingEnabled) {
00078         va_list args;
00079         va_start(args,format);
00080                 NSLogv(format, args);
00081         va_end(args);    
00082         }
00083 }
00084 
00085 + (NSString *) cachesDir {
00086         static NSString *cachesDir = nil;
00087         @synchronized(@"RESTClient.cachesDir") {
00088                 if (nil == cachesDir) {
00089                         NSArray *paths = NSSearchPathForDirectoriesInDomains(NSCachesDirectory, NSUserDomainMask, YES);
00090                         NSString *systemCaches = ([paths count] > 0) ? [paths objectAtIndex:0] : nil;
00091                         if (systemCaches) {
00092                                 cachesDir = [systemCaches stringByAppendingPathComponent:kRESTClientCachesDirectoryName];
00093                         }
00094                 }
00095         }
00096         return cachesDir;
00097 }
00098

00100 static NSTimeInterval timeout_ = 0;
00101 
00102 + (NSTimeInterval) timeout {
00103         return timeout_;
00104 }
00105 
00106 + (void) setTimeout:(NSTimeInterval)timeout {
00107         @synchronized(@"RESTClient.timeout") {
00108                 if (timeout_ != timeout) {
00109                         timeout_ = timeout;
00110                 }
00111         }
00112 }
00113 
00114 static id<RCAuthProvider> authProvider_ = nil;
00115 
00116 + (id<RCAuthProvider>)authProvider {
00117         return authProvider_;
00118 }
00119 
00120 + (void) setAuthProvider:(id<RCAuthProvider>)authProvider {
00121         @synchronized(@"RESTClient.authProvider") {
00122                 if (authProvider_ != authProvider) {
00123                         authProvider_ = authProvider;
00124                 }
00125         }
00126 }
00127 
00128 static NSMutableDictionary *headers_ = nil;
00129 
00130 + (NSMutableDictionary *) headers {
00131         @synchronized(@"RESTClient.headers") {
00132                 if (nil == headers_) {
00133                         headers_ = [NSMutableDictionary new];
00134                 }
00135         }
00136         return headers_;
00137 }
00138 
00139 + (void) setHeaders:(NSMutableDictionary *)headers {
00140         @synchronized(@"RESTClient.headers") {
00141                 if (headers_ != headers) {
00142                         headers_ = headers;
00143                 }
00144         }
00145 }

00154 
00155 + (RCResponse *) get:(NSString *)URLString {
00156         RCResource *resource = [self configuredResourceForURLString:URLString];
00157         return [resource get];
00158 }
00159

00162         [resource getWithCompletionBlock:completionBlock];

00244 // ========================================================================== //
00245 
00246 #pragma mark - Helpers
00247 
00248 + (RCResource *) configuredResourceForURLString:(NSString *)URLString {
00249         RCResource *resource = [RCResource withURL:URLString];
00250 
00251         resource.timeout = [self timeout];
00252         resource.headers = [self headers];
00253         resource.authProvider = [self authProvider];
00254         
00255         return resource;
00256 }
